main.name: Michael Ma
main.description: UIUC CS+Stats grad interested in machine learning and data
main.bio: Data analyst / machine learning background. Interested in leveraging huge data for inhuman inferences. Large experience in front-end and high level automation. I also love to work with hardware, so if you have any new 3080 Ti's feel free to call
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Lot of experience in basically everything

education.school: University of Illinois at Urbana Champaign
education.degree: Bachelors in Computer Science and Statistics
education.description: CS: Programming Languages & Compilers, Systems Programming, Computer Architecture, Data Structures STATS: Statistical Computing, Methods of Applied Statistics, High Frequency Trading, Economic Forecasting DEEP LEARNING: Applied Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Unsupervised Learning, Applied ML Econometrics

work.title: Software Development Intern
work.description: Worked on an internal rules engine for auditing deals on the promotions page. Main work revolved around improving efficiency for non technical employees to customize the engine. Additional work in automated testing of new components to the engine as well as old components.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Designed and implemented a flutter app to help bass fishermen. Using water and lighting conditions, the app simulated what a bass fish might see. Fishing lures can also be considered after conditions are known to find the most visible lure.

work.title: Full Stack Intern
work.description: End-to-end development of police GPS trackers. From soldering the hardware to designing the internal device tracking software and finally the client side graphical interface. Main work revolved around adding additional features supported in new-gen hardware and reflecting it on the client graphical interface.

work.title: Software Developer Intern
work.description: Developing and maintaining physics/rendering engine for ios game. Optimizations mainly targeted low end devices and bringing a smooth experience for old hardware. Additional client code allows for simplified physics and dynamic graphical fidelity.

work.title: Data Analyst Intern
work.description: Long term data cleaning and storage. Validating data using statistical models then proper storage via internal pipelines. Additional work in adding functionality in existing trader software that allowed for priority sorting of options/futures based on date.

projects.title: GPT-4
projects.category: Next generation human speech and text synthesis

testimonials.text: That Michael Ma must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
